answers.answer: Good luck I hope everything works out well!
Awww! Well goodluck hon I'll keep u in my prayers!
Good luck...and how cute!  my son was hiding his face when we tried to get 3D pics...so stubborn ! Oan, yu arw in my prayer sweetie!

question: So my uterus is measuring two weeks ahead because I have excessive amniotic fluid around baby. . Most likely because I have pregnancy diabetes. So I'm waiting for my glucose test results and they are going to monitor my fluid levels in 3 weeks... so I get to see baby again! Yay.  Pray I passed the test,  but I have a gut feeling I didn't :( wish me luck.Also, I had the most amazing 3d shots of the baby's face! He/she already has a head of hair and looks just like his damn daddy lol & he's 2lb 4oz doing well.  27wks today! ! !
